snippet: As Nicolás Maduro invokes Hugo Chávez’s ghost at rallies,  Henrique Capriles Radonski, Mr. Maduro’s opponent in Sunday’s presidential vote, is wooing rivals of the late leader.
abstract: Nicolas Maduro, late Venezuelan president Hugo Chavez's handpicked successor, claims to have been visited by Chavez's spirit as he campaigns to succeed him; is facing off against Henrique Capriles Radonski in intense, compressed campaign for president.
lead_paragraph: As Nicolás Maduro invokes Hugo Chávez’s ghost at rallies,  Henrique Capriles Radonski, Mr. Maduro’s opponent in Sunday’s presidential vote, is wooing rivals of the late leader.

headline.seo: Even in Death, Chávez Dominates Venezuela’s Presidential Race
headline.main: Even in Death, Chávez Is a Powerful Presence
headline.print_headline: Even in Death, Chávez Is a Powerful Presence
